name: Why Baby?
description:
Is your god a T-Rex? Is it hungry? Is it in a vat? Do you have to keep feeding it and refilling its vat before it dies? Then this game is about you! I just have one more question: Why Baby?

This is our second submission to Ludum Dare! Aside from bringing back Rory’s AMAZING art, we have Chris and Vinnie back as Devs. This time around we have Erin writing the dialogue and Ashton on music! Enjoy!!!

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move. ‘e’ or ‘space’ to interact. Also supports gamepads!
